text: WeRule is a community-focused mentorship platform that believes in the power of human connection and knowledge sharing. We facilitate meaningful relationships between mentors and mentees to foster growth, learning, and professional development.
Our mentor program connects experienced professionals with those seeking guidance. Mentors commit to regular meetings and provide valuable insights from their career journey.
The mentee program is designed for individuals looking to accelerate their growth through personalized guidance from experienced professionals in their field.
Subscription plans will be available starting September 1, 2025. We're currently in beta and accepting applications for our founding community.
